title: Beyond the Quill
description: we are a literary magazine that aims to establish a haven for writers, artists, and photographers. we want to display your talents in the best way possible. we publish editions, hold contests, and more interesting opportunities for all creatives!

title: Lavender Liberty
description: Lavender Liberty is a youth-led digital newspaper and creative platform rooted in social justice, radical storytelling, and political resistance. It amplifies the voices of young peopleâ€”especially those from marginalized communitiesâ€”through essays, journalism, poetry, and collaborative projects. Centered on truth-telling and transformation, Lavender Liberty challenges systems of power with sharp words, bold visuals, and unapologetic vision. More than a publication, it's a movement blooming at the intersection of protest, identity, and reimagined futures.
